name: Lethal Purple
description: Lethal Purple is a vibrantly colored indica-dominant hybrid first bred by Great White North Seeds in Canada. Once ripe, this floral-scented strain darkens to a deep purple color, flecked with lavender pastels. Sativa genetics peek through Lethal Purple’s heavy indica sensations and allow mental clarity and functionality in spite of its potent full-body effects.
descriptionPlain: Lethal Purple is a vibrantly colored indica-dominant hybrid first bred by Great White North Seeds in Canada. Once ripe, this floral-scented strain darkens to a deep purple color, flecked with lavender pastels. Sativa genetics peek through Lethal Purple’s heavy indica sensations and allow mental clarity and functionality in spite of its potent full-body effects.

highlightedReviews.text: A very dense flower, has a fruity aroma and flavor. Downside is that it could be harsh for beginners or even everyday consumers. The high is very strong and you feel it right away, lasts about a good 2h to 3h. Overall very interesting flower to play with.

Particularly enjoyed it. Had a pinch just for taste and now I'm writing this review... Oh god I should stop writing, I'm getting scared! Someone call a doctor. Dude, you! Yeah you can you call me a doctor?

articles.title: Five New Cannabis Strains with Canadian Origins
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
Some of the best cannabis strains we enjoy today migrated from the growers and seed banks of Canada. Since the 1990s when cannabis activism was revived with the opening of “hemp stores,” Canada has been a hotspot for new crossbred varieties.
Here are some of Leafly’s newcomers:
1. Blue God
Characteristics of Blue God:

100% indica
Breeder: Jordan of the Islands
Cross between God Bud and Blueberry
Berry aroma
Offers full-body relief
May help with pain and sleep disorders
Soil preferred for growing
55-60 day flowering time

2. Lethal Purple
Characteristics of Lethal Purple:

80% indica
Breeder: Great White North
Floral aroma
Offers full-body relief with mental clarity

3. Endless Sky
Characteristics of Endless Sky:

90% indica
Breeder: Greenthumb Seeds
Cross between Grenadine and Iranian landrace
Earthy, hashy aroma
Offers spacey, dreamy effects
Hydroponics preferred for growing
42-50 day flowering time

4. Lowryder
Characteristics of Lowryder:

Hybrid
Breeder: Joint Doctor Seeds
Cross between Ruderalis and Northern Lights #2 x William’s Wonder 
Dwarf-sized plant that grows no higher than 40cm
Earthy aroma
Slow onset with balanced head and body effects
Hardy plants with a 40-45 day flowering time

5. Sapphire Star
Characteristics of Sapphire Star:

60% sativa
Breeder: Jordan of the Islands
Cross between Blue Hawaiian sativa and God Bud
Berry, skunky aroma
Cerebrally energizing, physically calming
49-56 day flowering time
